title: Mixed Reality Game
description: Currently building a MR Game for the Meta Quest 3 Hack, featuring a puzzle box, with different themes, and a horror aspect. I am also building my own 2D game alone.

title: Educational Web App
description: My team and i built a prototype for an educational platform, using Figma and React.js. This included personalised learnig paths, and mentors on the site. This was part of the Microsoft Imagine Cup 2023 Competition.

title: Chatbots - An Assistant for Interviews
description: As part of an OpenAI hackathon, my team and I built a chatbot that would help with interviews, particularly for Software Engineering related roles

title: Creative Coding
description: I use Processing and p5.js to create interactive webcam filters, 3D Images and using perlin noise to create interactive art.
